TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler(object sender, SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs ^ e);
type SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The source of the event, the control.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 、 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件执行任何预处理步骤，例如，添加的参数对象所包含的之前捕获的输出参数值执行数据库操作。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event to perform any preprocessing steps, such as adding a parameter to the object contained by the to capture the value of an output parameter, before a database action is performed. 在此示例中插入由经典母版-详细信息方案中，使用存储的过程中的控件。In this example an insert is performed by a control in a classic master-detail scenario, using a stored procedure. 检查的输出参数，它表示新插入的行的主键，值时操作完成后引发事件。The value of the output parameter, which represents the primary key of the newly inserted row, is examined when the event is raised after the operation completes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何处理会引发事件控件，可能是取消执行的数据库操作与关联控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event raised by the control, to possibly cancel a database action performed by a control associated with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql/CS/sql6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql/VB/sql6vb.aspx#1)]
